parameters.param:
cd %system.teamcity.build.checkoutDir% && git fetch --all
cd %system.teamcity.build.checkoutDir% && docker build -t pytest_for_teamcity --build-arg TEAMCITY_PROJECT_NAME='%system.teamcity.projectName%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_BUILD_NUMBER='%system.build.number%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_BUILD_CONF_NAME='%system.teamcity.buildConfName%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_BUILD_BRANCH='%teamcity.build.branch%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_PROJECT_NAME='%system.teamcity.projectName%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_VERSION='%system.teamcity.version%' --build-arg TEAMCITY_CHECKOUT_DIR='%system.teamcity.build.checkoutDir%' -f Dockerfile .
